mapper.select: SELECT C.TENANT_ID , C.ENTER_CD , C.YMD , C.SABUN , E.FLEXIBLE_EMP_ID , E.WORK_MINUTE , E.OT_MINUTE , C.TIME_CD_MGR_ID , C.ENTRY_SDATE , C.ENTRY_EDATE , M.WORK_SHM , M.WORK_EHM , M.UNIT_MINUTE , T.BREAK_TYPE_CD , M.DEFAULT_WORK_USE_YN , M.FIXOT_USE_TYPE , M.UNPLANNED_YN , M.FIXOT_USE_LIMIT , E.SYMD , E.EYMD FROM WTM_FLEXIBLE_EMP E JOIN WTM_FLEXIBLE_STD_MGR M ON E.FLEXIBLE_STD_MGR_ID = M.FLEXIBLE_STD_MGR_ID JOIN WTM_WORK_CALENDAR C ON E.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND E.ENTER_CD = C.ENTER_CD AND E.SABUN = C.SABUN AND C.YMD BETWEEN E.SYMD AND E.EYMD JOIN WTM_TIME_CD_MGR T ON C.TIME_CD_MGR_ID = T.TIME_CD_MGR_ID WHERE E.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND E.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND E.SABUN = #{sabun} AND C.YMD = #{ymd} -- AND M.DEFAULT_WORK_USE_YN = 'Y' -- AND M.FIXOT_USE_TYPE = 'ALL' AND C.ENTRY_SDATE IS NOT NULL AND C.ENTRY_EDATE IS NOT NULL AND C.HOLIDAY_YN = 'N' AND C.ENTRY_SDATE < C.ENTRY_EDATE

SELECT XX.WORK_MINUTE AS WORK_MINUTE , XX.WORK_HOUR - XX.BREAK_HOUR AS SUM_WORK_MINUTE FROM ( SELECT E.WORK_MINUTE , SUM(CASE WHEN R.TIME_TYPE_CD IN ('BASE', 'REGA') OR (F_WTM_GET_EMP_DAY_OPTION(R.TENANT_ID, R.ENTER_CD, R.SABUN, R.YMD, 'TAA_TIME_YN') = 'Y' AND R.TIME_TYPE_CD = 'TAA') THEN F_WTM_NVL(R.APPR_MINUTE,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS WORK_HOUR , SUM(CASE WHEN R.TIME_TYPE_CD = 'EXCEPT' AND T.TAA_INFO_CD = 'BREAK' THEN F_WTM_NVL(R.APPR_MINUTE,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BREAK_HOUR FROM WTM_FLEXIBLE_EMP E LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_WORK_DAY_RESULT R ON R.TENANT_ID = E.TENANT_ID AND R.ENTER_CD = E.ENTER_CD AND R.SABUN = E.SABUN AND R.YMD BETWEEN E.SYMD AND E.EYMD LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_TAA_CODE T ON T.TENANT_ID = R.TENANT_ID AND T.ENTER_CD = R.ENTER_CD AND T.TAA_CD = R.TAA_CD WHERE E.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND E.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND E.SABUN = #{sabun} AND #{ymd} BETWEEN E.SYMD AND E.EYMD AND R.YMD BETWEEN E.SYMD AND #{ymd} GROUP BY E.WORK_MINUTE ) XX

SELECT XX.WORK_MINUTE AS FIX_OT_USE_LIMIT , XX.WORK_HOUR - XX.BREAK_HOUR AS SUM_FIX_OT_MINUTE FROM ( SELECT M.FIXOT_USE_LIMIT AS WORK_MINUTE , SUM(CASE WHEN R.TIME_TYPE_CD IN ('FIXOT') THEN R.APPR_MINUTE ELSE 0 END ) AS WORK_HOUR , SUM(CASE WHEN R.TIME_TYPE_CD = 'EXCEPT' AND T.TAA_INFO_CD = 'BREAK_FIXOT' THEN R.APPR_MINUTE ELSE 0 END ) AS BREAK_HOUR FROM WTM_WORK_DAY_RESULT R JOIN WTM_FLEXIBLE_EMP E ON R.TENANT_ID = E.TENANT_ID AND R.ENTER_CD = E.ENTER_CD AND R.SABUN = E.SABUN AND R.YMD BETWEEN E.SYMD AND E.EYMD JOIN WTM_FLEXIBLE_STD_MGR M ON E.FLEXIBLE_STD_MGR_ID = M.FLEXIBLE_STD_MGR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_TAA_CODE T ON T.TENANT_ID = R.TENANT_ID AND T.ENTER_CD = R.ENTER_CD AND T.TAA_CD = R.TAA_CD WHERE E.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND E.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND E.SABUN = #{sabun} AND #{ymd} BETWEEN E.SYMD AND E.EYMD AND R.APPR_MINUTE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY M.FIXOT_USE_LIMIT ) XX
